overview: This documentary tells the story of one of the world's greatest philosophers, Baruch Spinoza. From his banishment from the Jewish community in Amsterdam to settling down in the Hague, creator Robin Lutz traces the formulation of Spinoza's radical philosophy of freedom.
tagline: In so far as the mind sees things in their eternal aspect, it participates in eternity.
title: Spinoza: A Free Thinker
